title: Determine the Domain
text: The values of $$x$$ that can be taken are integers from $$1$$ to $$7$$. Confirm this by looking at the points with the lowest and highest $$x$$ values.

title: Determine the Range
text: The value of $$y$$ that can be taken is $$1$$.

title: One to One Functions
text: Is $$x$$ and $$y$$ one to one? Recall that a one to one function is a function in which each input value is mapped to one unique output value.
